title: tracked online
extract: Online behavioral tracking refers to the practice of tracking web users (and mobile apps users) on the Internet. Browsing histories, email interactions and website visitors' behaviors are tracked, collected and storaged for marketing and advertising purposes.Oct 1, 2012
extract_html: Online behavioral tracking refers to the practice of tracking web users (and mobile apps users) on the Internet. Browsing histories, email interactions and website visitors' behaviors are tracked, collected and storaged for marketing and advertising purposes.Oct 1, 2012
